title: Scikit-learn Crash Course - Machine Learning Library for Python
excerpt: Scikit-learn is a free software machine learning library for the Python programming language. Learn how to use it in this crash course.  ✏️ Course created by Vincent D. Warmerdam.  ⭐️ Course Contents ⭐️ ⌨️ (0:00:00) introduction ⌨️ (0:03:08) introducing scikit-learn ⌨️ (0:34:36) preprocessing ⌨️ (0:53:36)
